sentences.english: These two aspects influence is the state-owned tree farm economy develops excessively slow.
sentences.chinese: 这两方面的影响是国有林场的经济发展过缓。

sentences.english: I then went to the plantation of the procession and bought some saplings of camphors .
sentences.chinese: 母亲说要栽些树，我就到大队林场去买了些樟树苗。

sentences.english: It reaches 18 feet tall and is from a tree farm in Pennsylvania.
sentences.chinese: 这棵树接近18英尺高，来自宾州的一个林场。

sentences.english: The project has established nurseries and plantations to regenerate the forest.
sentences.chinese: 为了林区的更新，该项目建立了苗圃和林场。

sentences.english: Badaling in Beijing, a forest carbon sink forest farms have formed.
sentences.chinese: 在北京的八达岭，一个碳汇林林场已经成形。

sentences.english: Dixon said the company used products from sustainbly farmed forests in Canada.
sentences.chinese: Dixon说公司使用的原料来自加拿大可再生林场。

sentences.english: The species of scarabs attacking chestnuts were investigated in Hexi Forest Farm, Jingning County.
sentences.chinese: 景宁县鹤溪林场板栗林遭金龟子危害严重。

sentences.english: Workers self-supporting economy is an efficient form for the economy development of state forestry center.
sentences.chinese: 职工自营经济是国有林场经济发展的一种有效形式。

sentences.english: Badaling in Beijing, a jungle carbon sink jungle harvests have formed.

sentences.english: Before Calderon walked home to his own ranch, he drank coffee.
sentences.chinese: 卡尔登走回他自己林场的家之前喝了咖啡。

sentences.english: The software has already been used in Wen'an county.
sentences.chinese: 该系统已经应用于文安县多个林场。

sentences.english: Boy, one day you'll be a man.
sentences.chinese: 鲁朗林场的一个小孩，别嫌他脏，很可爱。

sentences.english: Setting up the harmonious forest farm is the inherent demand of forest management.
sentences.chinese: 论述了建立和谐林场是森林经理的内在要求。

sentences.english: The experiments on different afforestation techniques and measure of Chinese fir have been done in Jiangwai Forest Farm of Luoping County.
sentences.chinese: 在罗平县江外林场进行杉木不同造林技术措施试验。
